channel.title: How can I add a ::commands to my 317 server?
channel.description: Please post help no flamming i will give administrator to whoever helps me make this ::commands when server gets released!

item.title: How can I add a ::commands to my 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @InfiniteSense InfiniteSense
item.description:
@InfiniteSense wrote:

when i add a command its weird because it doesn’t register after i save it in client.java, im trying to add this command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone")) { teleportToX = 3425; teleportToY = 2927; }

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add a ::commands to my 317 server?

item.title: How can I add a ::commands to my 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

i don’t need admin but thanks…

			if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) {			
	sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@PVPScape commands:", 8145);

sendQuest("@dre@normal players:", 8145);


sendQuest("@dbl@::mypos", 8146);
sendQuest("@dbl@::master", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@::tank", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pure", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@::emote", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@::barrow", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@::runes", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pass", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@::players", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@::empty", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pickup", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@::message", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@::pk", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@::home", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@::jad", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@type ::modcommands for moderator+ commands!", 8161);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	}

to add a new line, go under the last sendquest line and add this:

sendQuest("@dbl@what you want to be shown in cmd line.", 8161)

the 8161 is the line number. add another one to it to go to the next ine. in short, it would be

sendQuest("@dbl@::vent", 8162);

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add a ::commands to my 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Open client.java and search this

private void customCommand(String command) {

All current commands should be there. To add a new command, just take the commands already there as an example.
